column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Back after 2 years in the cold day
column2: still good every time dine-in. Takoyaki was  tasty
column3: just need a bit temperature inside as it is supposed to be. Crispy chicken didnt stay in my mind. jinya tonsotku black is the best all the time.  Server was attentive
column6: little bit friendliness in the conversation because Jinya is the downtown upscale theme so I expected more than just fast and attentive service (8/10).   Plus one star for free parking.
